derivation: and (feminine) תּוֹלֵעָה; or תּוֹלַעַת; or תֹּלַעַת; from H3216 (יָלַע); a maggot (as voracious); specifically (often with ellipsis of H8144 (שָׁנִי))
outline:
1. worm, scarlet stuff, crimson
    1. worm - the female 'coccus ilicis'
    2. scarlet stuff, crimson, scarlet
      1. the dye made from the dried body of the female of the worm "coccus ilicis"
    3. worm, maggot
      1. worm, grub
      2. the worm "coccus ilicis"
strongs_def: the crimson-grub, but used only (in this connection) of the colorfrom it, and cloths dyed therewith
